item.description:
An Evening of SkyDancing Tantra: The Path of Bliss
with Steve & Lokita Carter

Turn your experience of sexual loving into a whole-body spiritual practice! This introductory evening workshop is a sacred and fun way for novices and experienced tantrikas alike to connect body, mind and spirit, deepen intimacy and learn more about Margot Anand’s SkyDancing Tantra.

In a respectful and safe environment, we will practice our intimate communication skills, and learn the first steps of The Breath of Tantric Love, a transformative breathing practice for ecstatic loving and deep connection with ourselves, another and the divine.

Whether you are a couple wanting to deepen your intimacy or a single person wishing to broaden your skills as a lover, this evening promises to be pleasurable, fun and life enhancing.

Steve and Lokita Carter are the principal lineage holders of Margot Anand’s SkyDancing Tantra method in the U.S. They have taught Tantra for 11 years to over 15,000 people in 350 workshop, and are the directors of the SkyDancing Tantra Institute USA. Steve and Lokita founded their Institute for Ecstatic Living in 1999.

Date: Monday, June 14th, 2010 from 7-10pm
Place: The Growing Green Wellness Center, 203 New Britain Ave, Hartford, CT - www.growinggreenevents.com

Costs: $30 per person, $50 per couple
Registration: email Imani@thegreenvibration.com
Information: Institute for Ecstatic Living Tel 877-982-6872 or info@ecstaticliving.com

Ecstatic Living
item.name: Sky Dancing Tantra Workshop
